Interface InController


  • public interface InController
    Interface for guiding the implementation of application controllers

    • Method Detail

      • addVideo

        void addVideo(java.lang.String cami,
            java.lang.String descripcio,
            java.lang.String codec,
            float durada,
            int alcada,
            int amplada,
            float fps)
              throws AppException
        Adds a video file to a repository
        Parameters:
        cami - Path of the video file
        descripcio - Description of the video
        codec - Codec of the video
        durada - Duration of the video
        alcada - Height of the video (in pixels)
        amplada - Width of the video (in pixels)
        fps - Resolution of the video (in frames per second)
        Throws:
        AppException

      • addAudio

        void addAudio(java.lang.String cami,
            java.lang.String camiImatge,
            java.lang.String descripcio,
            java.lang.String codec,
            float durada,
            int kbps)
              throws AppException
        Adds an audio file to a repository
        Parameters:
        cami - Path of the audio file
        camiImatge - Path of the image file to use during the playback
        descripcio - Description of the audio
        codec - Codec of the audio
        durada - Duration of the audio
        kbps - Quality of the audio (in kilobytes per second)
        Throws:
        AppException

      • addImage

        void addImage(java.lang.String cami,
            java.lang.String nom,
            int alcada,
            int amplada)
              throws AppException
        Adds an image file to a repository
        Parameters:
        cami - Path of the image file
        nom - Internal name to be assigned to the image file
        alcada - Height of the image (in pixels)
        amplada - Width of the image (in pixels)
        Throws:
        AppException
